          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Erdélyi lednek</string>
            <string language="en-US">Lathyrus transsylvanicus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lathyrus transsylvanicus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transsylvanicus de Lathyrus</string>

          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az erdélyi lednek (Lathyrus transsylvanicus) hazánkban kizárólag a Bükki Nemzeti Parkban fordul elő</string>
            <string language="en-US">In Hungary the lathyrus transsylvanicus solely occurs in the Bükk National Park</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In Ungarn tritt das lathyrus transsylvanicus nur 
im Bükk Nationalpark auf</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En Hongrie le transsylvanicus de lathyrus se 
produit seulement en parc national de Bükk</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em Hungria o transsylvanicus do lathyrus ocorre 
unicamente no parque nacional de Bükk</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In Ungheria il transsylvanicus di lathyrus si 
presenta solamente nel parco nazionale di Bükk</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στην Ουγγαρία το transsylvanicus lathyrus 
εμφανίζεται απλώς στο εθνικό πάρκο Bόkk</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En Hungría el transsylvanicus del lathyrus 
ocurre solamente en el parque nacional de Bükk</string>
          </description>
